title: Little Shop of Horrors
description:
A Classic RISK! Singles episode! A story that Ken Reid first shared on the podcast in October of 2014 about comic book fans before comics were cool.

 

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Ken Reid, Kevin Allison)
